definition: to prepare/get ready/to provide or equip
to inject/to pour into/to concentrate/to pay attention/stake (gambling)/classifier for sums of money/variant of 註|注[zhu4]

sentences.english: Comment: Consider common deployment scenarios and portability requirements.
sentences.chinese: 备注:考虑常用的部署场景和可移植性需求。

sentences.english: Other matters needing to state can be filled in the remarks column.
sentences.chinese: 其他需要说明事项填入备注栏。

sentences.english: Attached please find the captioned memo from COO for your perusal.
sentences.chinese: 翻译为请附上标题的备注从首席运营官查阅。

sentences.english: The word "Sample" should be indicated in remarks column of export license.
sentences.chinese: 出口许可证备注栏内应当注明“货样”字样。

sentences.english: I restored the notes to your name, even the name of the first appearance with the surname.
sentences.chinese: 我把备注还原成你的名字，连名带姓最初的样子。

sentences.english: If there are any parts in plastic boxes, show part numbers in the remarks column.
sentences.chinese: 胶盒若有配件则于备注栏显示其品号。

sentences.english: Please refer to next page for package details & remarks.
sentences.chinese: 请参阅下页之套餐详情及备注。

sentences.english: Please refer to next page for package remarks.
Comment: Consider the need for remote processing and distributed environments.
sentences.chinese: 备注:考虑远程处理和分布式环境的需求。

sentences.english: Reefer container from any port in china to odessa , we can offer the lowest price.
sentences.chinese: 备注国内任何港口到敖德萨冷柜，绝对的国内最低价。

sentences.english: Information on the funding of a study could be included under 'notes'.
sentences.chinese: 研究的资助信息可以放在“备注”栏中。

sentences.english: Professor wu will note inspection to his daughter, wu min.
sentences.chinese: 吴教授将备注检验交给他的女儿吴敏。

sentences.english: Thus, methodological problems preclude conclusive remarks concerning quality-of-life issues.
sentences.chinese: 因此，方法问题排除结论备注关于生活质量的问题。

sentences.english: I add some comments to the document for your reference。
sentences.chinese: 我就文档添加了一些备注，仅供参考。

sentences.english: Following are some remarks on the program structure.
sentences.chinese: 以下是有关程序结构的备注。

definition: to inject/to pour into/to concentrate/to pay attention/stake (gambling)/classifier for sums of money/variant of 註|注[zhu4]
Weixin or WeChat (mobile text and voice messaging service developed by Tencent 騰訊|腾讯[Teng2 xun4])
to scan a QR code or barcode
private correspondence/personal letter/(computing) personal message (PM)/to message sb
to ask/to invite/please (do sth)/to treat (to a meal etc)/to request
to mark out/to tag/to put a sign on sth explaining or calling attention to/to annotate (e.g. a character with its pinyin)
